verses.verse: Then I turned <WH7725>, and lifted up <WH5375> mine eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and behold a flying <WH5774> roll <WH4039>.

And he said <WH559> unto me, What seest <WH7200> thou? And I answered <WH559>, I see <WH7200> a flying <WH5774> roll <WH4039>; the length <WH753> thereof is twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> thereof ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520>.

Then said <WH559> he unto me, This is the curse <WH423> that goeth forth <WH3318> over the face <WH6440> of the whole earth <WH776>: for every one that stealeth <WH1589> shall be cut off <WH5352> as on this side according <WH3644> to it; and every one that sweareth <WH7650> shall be cut off <WH5352> as on that side according <WH3644> to it. every one that stealeth: or, every one of this people that stealeth holdeth himself guiltless, as it doth

I will bring it forth <WH3318>, saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, and it shall enter <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the thief <WH1590>, and into the house <WH1004> of him that sweareth <WH7650> falsely <WH8267> by my name <WH8034>: and it shall remain <WH3885> in the midst <WH8432> of his house <WH1004>, and shall consume <WH3615> it with the timber <WH6086> thereof and the stones <WH68> thereof.
Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me went forth <WH3318>, and said <WH559> unto me, Lift up <WH5375> now thine eyes <WH5869>, and see <WH7200> what is this that goeth forth <WH3318>.
And I said <WH559>, What is it? And he said <WH559>, This is an ephah <WH374> that goeth forth <WH3318>. He said <WH559> moreover, This is their resemblance <WH5869> through all the earth <WH776>.

And, behold, there was lifted up <WH5375> a talent <WH3603> of lead <WH5777>: and this is a <WH259> woman <WH802> that sitteth <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>. talent: or, weighty piece

And he said <WH559>, This is wickedness <WH7564>. And he cast <WH7993> it into the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>; and he cast <WH7993> the weight <WH68> of lead <WH5777> upon the mouth <WH6310> thereof.

Then lifted I up <WH5375> mine eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and, behold, there came out <WH3318> two <WH8147> women <WH802>, and the wind <WH7307> was in their wings <WH3671>; for they had <WH2007> wings <WH3671> like the wings <WH3671> of a stork <WH2624>: and they lifted up <WH5375> the ephah <WH374> between the earth <WH776> and the heaven <WH8064>.
Then said <WH559> I to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me, Whither do these bear <WH3212> the ephah <WH374>?
And he said <WH559> unto me, To build <WH1129> it an house <WH1004> in the land <WH776> of Shinar <WH8152>: and it shall be established <WH3559>, and set <WH3240> there upon her own base <WH4369>.
